dict.acceptation: 绝对地；完全地；毫无疑问地；[语]独立地，分离地；

sent.orig: Are you ready to do a far-out comedy? -Absolutely. Absolutely. Thank you very much!
sent.trans: 你准备好参演一部走在时代前端的喜剧了吗？-当然，当然。非常感谢！

sent.orig: To be here at the White House, absolutely absolutely amazing experience.
sent.trans: 能够参加白宫的这次或多绝对是令人兴奋的经历。

sent.orig: Dr. Forman: You absolutely do. And I absolutely have the right to humiliate you for it.
sent.trans: 你当然有，而我也当然有对此取乐的权利。

sent.orig: It's harmful either to absolutely affirm or absolutely negate them in the practice.
sent.trans: 绝对否定或肯定两者中的任意一个，在实践中都是有害的。
